```{r setup, include=FALSE}
load("../../downloads/basic.Rdata")
library(disR)
library(tidyverse)

```

## R Markdown

```{r}
indicators %>%
  filter(ic == "EG.3.2-25" ) %>%
  left_join(values, join_by(id == id_ind)) %>%
  left_join(ims , join_by(id_im == id)) %>%
  filter(type == "Actual") %>%
  group_by(ro, ou, year) %>%
  summarize(value = sum_(value), .groups = "drop") %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = year, values_from = value )

```
